resources.string: Restore your old wallet or create your new Minerva digital wallet.
What you can do with your new Minerva digital wallet:
Create new identities and use them to log in to different services.
Own digital assets and use them for transactions and trading.
Have a control over all the services you are sharing your data with.
Creating your wallet failed. Please check your connection and/or retry later
A bip39 seed phrase is an alternative way to backup or remember your private key:
An error occurred while retrieving mnemonic
No Minerva Wallet found for the seed phrase you entered. Please make sure that you entered the words in the correct order and that you\'re using a seedphrase which was created by the Minerva App.
You haven\'t yet made a backup of your Minerva Wallet.
This is needed in order to recover identities and values in case something goes wrong with your phone.
